code: import React from'react';import{useBasket}from'../context/BasketContext';import'../styles/BasketPage.css';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{PAYMENT_ROUTE}from"../utils/consts";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BasketPage=()=>{const{basket,removeFromBasket}=useBasket();const navigate=useNavigate();const totalPrice=basket.reduce((sum,item)=>sum+item.price,0);const handleCheckout=()=>{navigate(PAYMENT_ROUTE);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"basket-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"basket-title",children:"\uD83D\uDED2 \u041A\u043E\u0440\u0437\u0438\u043D\u0430"}),basket.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"empty-message",children:"\u041A\u043E\u0440\u0437\u0438\u043D\u0430 \u043F\u0443\u0441\u0442\u0430"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"basket-items",children:basket.map(device=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"basket-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"basket-item-img",src:process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL+device.img}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"basket-item-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:device.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[device.price," \u20BD"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"remove-btn",onClick:()=>removeFromBasket(device.basketId),children:"\u0423\u0434\u0430\u043B\u0438\u0442\u044C"})]},device.basketId))}),basket.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("footer",{className:"basket-footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"total-price",children:["\u0418\u0442\u043E\u0433\u043E: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:[totalPrice," \u20BD"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"checkout-btn",onClick:handleCheckout,children:"\u041E\u0444\u043E\u0440\u043C\u0438\u0442\u044C \u0437\u0430\u043A\u0430\u0437"})]})]});};export default BasketPage;
